interactions:
Kayako - ticket id 60252864 // Mike Kebede commented publicly: Dear Ashraaz,

Thank you for contacting us regarding the expired Kerio Control license for Rooster Poultry. I understand the impact this is having on your services, and I appreciate your patience while we review your request.

I would like to clarify that Kerio Support does not have the ability to issue temporary licenses or extend expired licenses. All licensing actions, including renewals and any exceptions, must be handled strictly through our Sales and Licensing channels.

NEXT STEP REQUIRED

Since you have not been able to reach your reseller and your renewal has been delayed, please submit your request directly to GFI Sales using the Customer Care form below:

https://customercare.gfi.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

When submitting your request, please include:

	*
Your Kerio Control license key: 20339-Z6JHP-2QUX8

	*
Your company name: Rooster Poultry

	*
A summary explaining that the reseller has not responded to your renewal attempts

	*
Your preferred contact details

WHAT WILL HAPPEN NEXT

Once GFI Sales receives your request, they will:

	*
Contact your reseller on your behalf

	*
Investigate the delay

	*
Assist in moving your license renewal forward as quickly as possible

Please let me know if you need help preparing any of the information for the submission or if there is anything else I can assist you with while this is being addressed.

Best regards,
Mike Kebede
GFI - Kerio Control Support Team

This ticket will stay open for one week unless you reply with "This ticket can be closed" or update the status to Completed in the portal. We will write to you again to remind you.

 Please select from the below or give me a detailed description of what’s happening. Any error messages you’ve seen or steps you’ve already tried would be really helpful.
💡Getting the most out of Kerio Control ATLAS Support Chat [https://support.keriocontrol.gfi.com/article/117054]

If I'm not able to resolve your issue, I can connect you with one of our support specialists who will have all the information from our conversation, so you won't need to repeat yourself. 💪 

--- Customer (Ashraaz Nadeem Yusuf) ---

 Expired license 

--- AI Assistant ---

 Since it's a delicate topic, I want to make extra sure: are you seeking assistance with renewing/modifying/cancelling an existing license, or purchasing a new license and not for technical issues related to a license that is already renewed, correct?

ℹ️ Note: you can use the below buttons or type in 

--- Customer (Ashraaz Nadeem Yusuf) ---

 Need tech support 

--- AI Assistant ---

 😳 Sorry about the misunderstanding, let's try again. 

--- AI Assistant ---

 Got it! So you're experiencing a technical issue related to an expired license in Kerio Control. Let me help you with that.

Could you tell me a bit more about what's happening? For example:

 	* What specific error message or behavior are you seeing related to the expired license?
 	* When did the license expire, or when did you first notice this issue?
 	* Have you already renewed the license and are having trouble applying it, or is the license still expired?

This will help me understand exactly what's going on and get you the right solution! 🔍 

--- Customer (Ashraaz Nadeem Yusuf) ---

 Today 

--- AI Assistant ---

 Thanks for that! Just to clarify a bit more so I can help you effectively:

Is the license still expired and needs to be renewed, or have you already renewed/obtained a new license but are having trouble applying it to Kerio Control?

This will help me point you in the right direction! 😊 

--- Customer (Ashraaz Nadeem Yusuf) ---

 Needs to be renewed 

--- AI Assistant ---

 Perfect, thanks for clarifying! So you need to renew your Kerio Control license subscription. Let me explain how that works.

License renewals are handled through sales channels, not through technical support. Here are your options:

OPTION 1: CONTACT YOUR RESELLER (RECOMMENDED)

If you purchased Kerio Control through a reseller, reach out to them directly to renew your license subscription.

OPTION 2: FIND A NEW RESELLER

If you can't reach your original reseller, you can find a new one in your area through the GFI reseller network.

OPTION 3: CONTACT GFI SALES DIRECTLY

If you're unable to contact a reseller, you can reach out to the GFI Sales Team through the GFI Customer Care Center [https://customercare.gfi.com/hc/en-us/requests/new]. When you contact them, please provide:

 	* Your current license number
 	* Your organization/company name
 	* Your previous invoice (if you have it)

AFTER YOUR LICENSE IS RENEWED

Once the renewal is complete, you'll need to register or update the license in Kerio Control using the Configuration Assistant (either Register Product or Update license info options).

More details can be found in this article: Renewing Kerio Control license [https://support.keriocontrol.gfi.com/article/120204]

Is there anything else I can help clarify about the renewal process? 😊 

--- Customer (Ashraaz Nadeem Yusuf) ---

 Seeking temporary extensionSupport ticket pleae 

--- AI Assistant ---

 I understand you're looking for a temporary license extension while you work on the renewal. Unfortunately, temporary license extensions are not something that technical support can provide - these would need to be handled through the sales/licensing channels I mentioned earlier (reseller or GFI Sales team via the GFI Customer Care Center [https://customercare.gfi.com/hc/en-us/requests/new]).

However, I can connect you with a support agent who can create a ticket to document your situation and potentially explore if there are any options available. They'll have all the context from our conversation.

Before I transfer you, could you please provide:

 	* Your current license number (if you have it handy)
 	* Your company/organization name

This will help the agent assist you more quickly. Would you like me to connect you now? 🙂 

--- Customer (Ashraaz Nadeem Yusuf) ---

 Rooster Poultry

 Thank you for sharing your company name, Rooster Poultry. A human colleague is available to assist you further with your license extension request—please feel free to choose from the handover options below to continue. 😊
